Generated Narrative: ValueSet v3-ParticipationVerifier

Language: en

  • Include codes fromhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ParticipationType where concept is-a VRF

name: ParticipationVerifier
title: ParticipationVerifier
description: A person who verifies the correctness and appropriateness of the service (plan, order, event, etc.) and hence takes on accountability.
